text:
Dirk van den Broek (; 27 March 1924 – 8 April 2020) was a Dutch businessman. He was the founder of the "Samenwerkende Dirk van den Broek Bedrijven". A couple of years later he changed his stores, just into Dirk named after himself. He was founder of travel agent D-reizen. He was born in Amsterdam.
Van den Broek died at the age of 96 on 8 April 2020.
